subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The American Joe Ogilvie won the $4 million U.S. Bank Championship yesterday after shooting a three-under-par 67 in the final round to finish at 14-under 266.It was Ogilvie’s first PGA Tour victory and his 230th event.Ogilvie was tied for the lead at 11 under with Tim Clark through 15 holes in the final round. But a long-distance eagle on the par-4 No. 16 and a birdie on No. 18 allowed him to secure the win at the Brown Deer Park Golf Course in Milwaukee.Ogilvie finished with four birdies and overcame three bogeys en route to capturing the $720,000 first-place purse.
